title: Thai clubs in the Asian Club Championship
text:
Seven clubs represented Thailand at various times in the <a href="AFC%20Champions%20League">AFC Asian Club Championship</a>, a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> competition which took place each year 1967–71 and 1985–2002. The most successful Thai club was <a href="Bangkok%20Bank%20F.C.">Bangkok Bank F.C.</a>, which qualified nine times.
Participation.
A total of seven clubs represented Thailand in the AFC Asian Club Championship, which became defunct in 2002.
W : "Winner"
